plot outline: The Story is based on Crime and Suspense-thriller with three separate stories that eventually connect to each other. It is based on the philosophy of karma- "what goes around ,comes around."It is all about consequences whether good or bad.The actual incidents are hidden from reality of the world. The investigation deals with finding out the Truth.
title: Nanna Prakara
